title: Supreme Court Won't Consider Johnson & Johnson Challenge to Baby Powder Judgment
sub_head: Plaintiffs allege talcum contained asbestos, caused cancer
body:
Breaking News
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court on Tuesday declined to consider a Johnson & Johnson appeal that sought to challenge a $2.1 billion civil judgment awarded to 20 women who alleged the company’s talcum baby powder caused ovarian cancer.
(More to come)
